original_text: One day, you may have a prophet among you who tells you what will happen in the future. He may have dreams about what will happen. He may promise to do miracles to show that he is right.
korean_text: 너희 중에 선지자나 꿈 꾸는 자가 일어나서 이적과 기사를 네게 보이고

sentences.original_text: One day, you may have a prophet among you
sentences.korean_translation: 언젠가, 너희 중에 선지자가 있을 수 있다

sentences.original_text: who tells you what will happen in the future
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 미래에 무슨 일이 일어날지 말해줄 것이다

sentences.original_text: He may have dreams about what will happen
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 무슨 일이 일어날지에 대한 꿈을 꿀 수 있다

sentences.original_text: He may promise to do miracles
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 기적을 행하겠다고 약속할 수 있다

sentences.original_text: to show that he is right
